Texts.Chs: 现在，你建了许多蜂箱，里面分别住着各种蜜蜂。如果把^orange;森林蜂后^reset;和^orange;普通蜜蜂^reset;放在一个大型蜂箱，会^green;发生什么事^reset;呢？快来试试看。
Texts.Eng: So, you've got apiaries, honey bees and forest bees. Now, I wonder: ^green;what would happen^reset; if you put a ^orange;forest queen^reset; and some ^orange;honey drones^reset; into that ^orange;giant apiary^reset;? The resulting ^orange;queen^reset; is your goal.

Texts.Chs: 你可以使用类似于植物杂交的方法来繁殖出新的蜜蜂品种。但^orange;不是所有蜜蜂^reset;都可以杂交成功的。你需要大量的实验才能找出正确的方法。
Texts.Eng: You can create numerous types of bees using a similar method with other strains. ^orange;Not all bees^reset; can be bred with every family-type. You'll need to experiment yourself to find out what works.
